about_the_game:
Expand your Transport INC gameplay into the oceans of the world. New vehicles, events, custom routes, water themed maps, and more await beyond the water horizon.



Transport by land, air and now SEA as well! Purchase the all new ship license from the store to use cargo and passenger ships to conquer aquatic transportation.



Unlike other vehicles, you must plan your own custom routes using shipping lanes. These shipping lanes are not free, so it’s important to plan the most efficient routes.



Coastal cities are tagged with the all new port icon. Upgrade these ports to allow bigger ships to dock and increase city demands.


Reroute vehicles around damaging storms. Place your vehicles in depots to protect them from devastating hurricanes. Avoid pillaging pirates or lose all of your cargo.



Enjoy an all new campaign with 7 challenging chapters including a FULL WORLD global transportation map. All of these new maps are also available in freeplay mode.
detailed_description:
Expand your Transport INC gameplay into the oceans of the world. New vehicles, events, custom routes, water themed maps, and more await beyond the water horizon.



Transport by land, air and now SEA as well! Purchase the all new ship license from the store to use cargo and passenger ships to conquer aquatic transportation.



Unlike other vehicles, you must plan your own custom routes using shipping lanes. These shipping lanes are not free, so it’s important to plan the most efficient routes.



Coastal cities are tagged with the all new port icon. Upgrade these ports to allow bigger ships to dock and increase city demands.


Reroute vehicles around damaging storms. Place your vehicles in depots to protect them from devastating hurricanes. Avoid pillaging pirates or lose all of your cargo.



Enjoy an all new campaign with 7 challenging chapters including a FULL WORLD global transportation map. All of these new maps are also available in freeplay mode.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Neccessary
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Neccessary

name: Transport INC - Seamanship

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Neccessary
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 Mb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Neccessary

short_description: Expand your Transport INC gameplay into the oceans of the world. New vehicles, events, custom routes, water themed maps, and more await beyond the water horizon.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Czech, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
